abstract: Steve Ballmer told employees he knows exactly what Yahoo is worth and won’t spend a dime more. In fact, Microsoft’s bet is so big, and uncertain, that Yahoo will likely be worth far more or far less than the $45 billion Microsoft is offering.

lead_paragraph: UPDATED 5:00 p.m.: As merger talks between Microsoft and Yahoo got serious Friday, it was clear that Microsoft Chief Executive Steve Ballmer is going to haggle over every last dime.

headline.main: Steve Ballmer Wants to Hold On to His Dimes
